DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , phase II study determine toxicity antitumor activity ABI-007 100 mg/m2 administer weekly 3 week follow rest week ( 4-week cycle ) first line therapy patient metastatic breast cancer follow 2 cohort : Patients receive taxane part adjuvant therapy , patient receive taxane part adjuvant therapy . Patients assess antitumor response every 8 week . The last subject receive study treatment 11DEC2012 . The study terminate 31 May 2013 via notification letter investigator 14 May 2013 .
